about_the_game:
🌌 An Uncharted Sci-Fi World
Dive into a visually stunning, story-rich universe where every corner tells a story. From the wreckage of abandoned stations to mysterious laser fields and crumbling industrial landscapes, each scene reveals new clues about humanity's downfall.

🕹️ Unique Gameplay Perspectives
Experience seamless transitions between gameplay styles:

  • 3rd Person 2D Exploration: Navigate intricate environments and uncover hidden pathways.

  • First-Person 3D Action: Engage in immersive, high-stakes moments where you are face-to-face with the unknown.

  • ⚙️ Survival Through Innovation
    The odds are stacked against you, but you're not powerless. Utilize an intuitive skill-equipping system to adapt to every scenario. Toggle through abilities, fight off threats, and solve puzzles—all with a single press of the TAB key.

🔥 Dynamic Challenges
Encounter environmental hazards like laser fields that ignite your ship, pushing you to think quickly and strategize under pressure. Enable and disable effects like burning VFX seamlessly to maintain immersion.

🎮 Engaging Combat and Exploration
Control your spaceship with precision as the mouse guides your horizontal and vertical movements. Explore vast and intricate levels while managing resources and upgrading your ship to survive the hostile environment.

🎨 Atmospheric Design
Start in eerie darkness, with only emergency power guiding your way. The game’s ambiance reflects the broken world around you, immersing players in its haunting beauty.

🔧 For Fans of Indie Gaming
Crafted with passion by a dedicated indie developer, Hollow Frontier combines creative mechanics, storytelling, and rich environments to deliver a unique gaming experience.

name: Hollow Frontier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 (1GB VRAM) or equivalent integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 (1GB VRAM) or equivalent integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Hollow Frontier is a thrilling sci-fi adventure where survival is your only option. Explore a haunting, collapsed world. Solve puzzles, fight for survival, and uncover dark secrets. Experience dynamic gameplay in both 3rd person and FPS perspectives
